file.name: Disbursement.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Disbursement
  description: This service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/Disbursement/10.0.0
paths:
  /Disbursement/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - DisbursementTransaction
      summary: InCR Initiate a disbursement
      description: InCR Initiate a disbursement
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/DisbursementTransaction'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateDisbursementTransactionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Disbursement/{disbursementId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - DisbursementTransaction
      summary: UpCR Update details of a disbursement
      description: UpCR Update details of a disbursement
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/DisbursementID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/DisbursementTransaction'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisbursementTransaction'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Disbursement/{disbursementId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - DisbursementTransaction
      summary: ExCR Execute an automated task against an active disbursement
      description: ExCR Execute an automated task against an active disbursement
      operationId: Execute
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/DisbursementID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/DisbursementTransaction'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisbursementTransaction'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Disbursement/{disbursementId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - DisbursementTransaction
      summary: RqCR Request manual intervention with a disbursement transaction
      description: RqCR Request manual intervention with a disbursement transaction
      operationId: Request
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/DisbursementID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/DisbursementTransaction'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisbursementTransaction'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Disbursement/{disbursementId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - DisbursementTransaction
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a disbursement transaction
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a disbursement transaction
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/DisbursementID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisbursementTransaction'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    DisbursementTransaction:
      type: object
      properties:
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        AuthorizingEmployeeReference:
          type: object
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        FundingAccountReference:
          type: object
        PayeeReference:
          type: object
        PayeeProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        PayeeBankReference:
          type: object
        Amount:
          type: string
        Currency:
          type: string
        ValueDate:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateDisbursementTransactionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        DisbursementTransaction:
          type: object
          properties:
            ValueDate:
              type: string
  parameters:
    DisbursementID:
      name: disbursementId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
  requestBodies:
    DisbursementTransaction:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DisbursementTransaction'
  responses:
    HTTPError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    BadRequestError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    UnauthorizedError:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    ForbiddenError:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    NotFoundError:
      description: Not Found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    TooManyRequestsError:
      description: Too Many Requests
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    InternalServerError:
      description: Internal Server Error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
...
